page.title: 13CHILDRENS ATTITUDES
page.content: { As a final exercise the members of the survey-group decided to see what the attitudes were,of children of age 12 and 13,to the features in our block. The majority of those asked felt that the special assets of the area,the bird sanctuary and Piel Castle,were simply "boring!".Children of this age seem to prefer the attractions of the Caravan Park to Local and Natural History.However,many suggestions were put forward to alleviate the dereliction of the South End of Walney.For example,converting the waste-land into a motorcycle scramble track that is run by youngsters in an attempt to prevent vandalism. { }
